entry.title: OpenClaw's memory-lancedb-pro Plugin Supercharges Agent Memory with Hybrid Retrieval
entry.summary: TypeScript extension to LanceDB delivers BM25 fusion, reranking, and multi-scope isolation for robust RAG in OpenClaw agents.
